name: Witchy Dice
description:
Witchy Dice: Battle Yahtzee is an exciting and challenging turn-based combat game where players take on the role of a powerful witch battling demons. 

Players roll the dice to create combinations and use them to unleash powerful moves in combat. The better the combination, the stronger the move. With each victory, players will face tougher enemies and have the opportunity to unlock new, more powerful dice. 

Each dice has unique abilities and the player must beat increasingly challenging enemies to gain access to them. This thrilling game blends the classic elements of the popular dice game Yahtzee with intense turn-based combat, creating an immersive and engaging experience for players. 

As the player progresses, they will continue to grow in power and skill, unlocking new abilities and facing increasingly formidable foes. If you're looking for an exciting and challenging gaming experience, look no further than Witchy Dice: Battle Yahtzee

Art credits: Akanksha Mishra, check her out she is the best <3 

--- this game is still under development and testing, there might be some bugs and issues. sorry about that :( --

but i hope you have fun playing
